requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: CHEM 202ZL students will use molecular modeling to build 3-D chemical structures. They will then prepare an ester derivative, perform a nucleophilic addition, and stusy elimination reactions. Products of these reactions will be analyzed using a variety of instruments (IR, NMR, HPLC, etc.).
prerequisites: AP score of 4 or higher or IB score of 5 or higher required.
